name: Cube Glide - Dash Game
description:
Guide the cube through the pillars and try to stay alive for as long as you can. Never go too close to the cliffs. jump of the cliffs and stay safe. 

It is easy to dash the cube to the ground from the Air with a single Tap. The more time you stay on the grounds, the more points you earn!

You Cube can score you points if you glide it on top of the pillars. Falling off the cliff will end the game and you will have to go to the start.

Controls-

Tap once to jump from ground
Tap again from the air to briskly push the cube to the ground
